A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If there was anyone who was upset that Force Awakens was remake you are going to get something fresh with Last Jedi... Movies\, as a basic part of storytelling usually lead you and as a 40 year old fan of Star Wars\, you think you know where the movie is going to take you. Like when you go into someone’s house\, and based on general home layouts\, you usually can find the bathroom. In this case Last Jedi will be the House where you thought the bathroom was supposed to be and it is not. This happens several times. Leave the Typical in the movie theater parking lot and get ready for a novel story you will never anticipate. No more remakes!
